byline.contributor: Jodi Rudoren contributed reporting from Jerusalem.

abstract: Sec of State John Kerry, appearing before Senate panel, cautions critics of nuclear talks with Iran to 'wait and see' what negotiations with Tehran will lead to; specifically references Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu, who is due to address Congress.
lead_paragraph: The secretary of state urged people to “wait and see” what negotiations with Tehran would produce, specifically mentioning Benjamin Netanyahu a week before the Israeli premier’s address to Congress.

headline.main: Kerry Cautions Critics of Nuclear Talks With Iran
headline.print_headline: Kerry Cautions Critics of Nuclear Talks With Iran

snippet: The secretary of state urged people to “wait and see” what negotiations with Tehran would produce, specifically mentioning Benjamin Netanyahu a week before the Israeli premier’s address to Congress.
